sent.orig: I see no objection whatsoever to give them a lecture on tragedies.
sent.trans: 我根本不反对给他们开一个讲座，谈谈悲剧。

sent.orig: Deceiving us will not do you any good whatsoever.
sent.trans: 欺骗我们不能带给你任何好处。

sent.orig: Apart from image building as The Evil Overlord, they hardly seem to have any purpose whatsoever.
sent.trans: 除了为黑魔王塑造形象以外，这种活动似乎找不到任何其它目的。

sent.orig: No matter whatsoever I bless all every day! -- Healthy!
sent.trans: 无论成败荣辱，我每天为大家祈祷----健康！
